content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254872,"originalJapaneseLine":"レキシントンを倒します。で、そのまま殺して魔血魂を回収","translatedEnglishLine":"We defeat Lexington. Then, kill him as is and collect the Magic Blood Soul."},{"lineNumber":254873,"originalJapaneseLine":"しまった、うっかりやったしまった・・おっさんぽかったが女の子だったのに・・と","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn, I did it carelessly... He looked like an old man, but he was actually a girl..."},{"lineNumber":254874,"originalJapaneseLine":"残念に思っていると、死体がどんどんおっさんに戻っていく・・うわ、おっさんがばけていたのか","translatedEnglishLine":"As I was feeling disappointed, the corpse gradually transformed back into an old man... Wow, so the old man was disguised."},{"lineNumber":254875,"originalJapaneseLine":"殺してよかった","translatedEnglishLine":"Good thing I killed him."},{"lineNumber":254876,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":254877,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔血魂が転がる、それをアトランタが拾おうとしたが","translatedEnglishLine":"The Magic Blood Soul rolls away, and Atlanta tries to pick it up,"},{"lineNumber":254878,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ランスが拾い上げる・・がはははは、やらんぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"But Rance picks it up... Hahaha, I'm not giving it to you."},{"lineNumber":254879,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっぱいもみながら、お前には何度か面倒な邪魔をされた","translatedEnglishLine":"While fondling your breasts, you've caused me troublesome disturbances many times."},{"lineNumber":254880,"originalJapaneseLine":"これまでの迷惑代を返してもらうぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll make you pay for all the trouble you've given me."},{"lineNumber":254881,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺の肉奴隷にしてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll make you my sex slave."},{"lineNumber":254882,"originalJapaneseLine":"これからもずっと素っ裸でいるがよい","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, you shall remain completely naked."},{"lineNumber":254883,"originalJapaneseLine":"がははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha!"},{"lineNumber":254884,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリーザス側視点、いっきに押せ押せ状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Lysus side perspective, rapidly pushing forward aggressively."},{"lineNumber":254885,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t勝ちまくります","translatedEnglishLine":"Winning repeatedly."},{"lineNumber":254886,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍側視点","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Army side perspective."},{"lineNumber":254887,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t二人の魔人を一気に失った、魔人など偉そうだがこの程度","translatedEnglishLine":"We lost two demon lords at once; though they act proud, they're just this much."},{"lineNumber":254888,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t私がリーザスを潰す。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will crush Lysus."},{"lineNumber":254889,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもうひとりいたな邪魔だから更迭しよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was another one, right? She's a nuisance, so I'll replace her."},{"lineNumber":254890,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜クリア＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Clear>"},{"lineNumber":254891,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＞勝利","translatedEnglishLine":"> Victory"},{"lineNumber":254892,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tハウゼルを力技で倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat Housel by brute force."},{"lineNumber":254893,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの方面の魔軍は総崩れ","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army in this sector is completely collapsing."},{"lineNumber":254894,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラの説得でハウゼルがおとなくなった","translatedEnglishLine":"Housel calmed down after Satella’s persuasion."},{"lineNumber":254895,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまだ手は出せないが、手元にあるのでじっくりチャンスを見て犯そう","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't make a move yet, but since he's at hand, I’ll patiently wait for the chance to violate him."},{"lineNumber":254896,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺様が優秀過ぎるので予定より早くミッション完了したが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because I'm too excellent, the mission was completed earlier than planned,"},{"lineNumber":254897,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの勢いで一気にもう一人の魔人シルキィを倒すか、それとも帰るか考えている","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm thinking whether to use this momentum to quickly defeat the other demon lord Silky or to return."},{"lineNumber":254898,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼル、シルキィの両方を撃破","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeated both Housel and Silky."},{"lineNumber":254899,"originalJapaneseLine":"がはははは、お持ち帰りだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahahahaha, taking them home."},{"lineNumber":254900,"originalJapaneseLine":"５日後・・　どこか","translatedEnglishLine":"Five days later... somewhere."},{"lineNumber":254901,"originalJapaneseLine":"火炎とゆきちゃん、どうなっているよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"What’s happening with Kaen and Yuki-chan?"},{"lineNumber":254902,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人とも人間に負けて連れ去れた・・有り得ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Both lost to humans and were taken away... Unbelievable."},{"lineNumber":254903,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヨシフは怒っていたけど、助ける気なんかないみたい","translatedEnglishLine":"Yoshif was angry, but it seems he has no intention to rescue them."},{"lineNumber":254904,"originalJapaneseLine":"私達がいかないといけないわ","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to go."},{"lineNumber":254905,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t二人はリーザス城でなくランス城に移送されたときき","translatedEnglishLine":"We heard the two were transferred to Rance Castle, not Lysus Castle."},{"lineNumber":254906,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t火炎とゆきちゃんは、ランス城に侵入した","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaen and Yuki-chan infiltrated Rance Castle."},{"lineNumber":254907,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそこで見たのは","translatedEnglishLine":"What they saw there was..."},{"lineNumber":254908,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tがははははと、もう二人と３Ｐプレイしまくりのランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance laughing 'Gahahahaha,' already having threesomes with the other two."},{"lineNumber":254909,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tうわっ・・なんて事に・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... What is this..."},{"lineNumber":254910,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜クリア＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<Clear>"},{"lineNumber":254911,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザスへ向かって出発するランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others depart heading toward Lysus."},{"lineNumber":254912,"originalJapaneseLine":"報告．魔人レキシントンが動き出した","translatedEnglishLine":"Report: Demon lord Lexington has started moving."},{"lineNumber":254913,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍司令部、ヨシフとハウゼル","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Army Headquarters, Yoshif and Housel."},{"lineNumber":254914,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスに不審がられて魔界に戻される","translatedEnglishLine":"They became suspicious to Kaivelis and were sent back to the demon world."},{"lineNumber":254915,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブワンが引き取りにやってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaive One comes to pick them up."},{"lineNumber":254916,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍司令部、ヨシフとシルキィ","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Army Headquarters, Yoshif and Silky."},{"lineNumber":254917,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスに不審がられて魔界に戻される","translatedEnglishLine":"They became suspicious to Kaivelis and were sent back to the demon world."},{"lineNumber":254918,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブワンが引き取りにやってくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Kaive One comes to pick them up."},{"lineNumber":254919,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中、サテラにレキシントンの事を聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way, ask Satella about Lexington."},{"lineNumber":254920,"originalJapaneseLine":"知らないというか、居ないはずなんだけど","translatedEnglishLine":"She doesn’t really know; he shouldn’t even exist."},{"lineNumber":254921,"originalJapaneseLine":"昔いたよ、聖魔教団との戦争において唯一人間に倒されたのが","translatedEnglishLine":"He was around long ago, the only one defeated by humans in the war against the Holy Demon Cult."},{"lineNumber":254922,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レキシントン、魔人の恥と言われていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon lord Lexington, called the disgrace of demon lords."},{"lineNumber":254923,"originalJapaneseLine":"死んだと聞いていたのだけど・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard he was dead, though..."},{"lineNumber":254924,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかして復活したのかしら","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be he has been resurrected?"},{"lineNumber":254925,"originalJapaneseLine":"どんな奴なのだ、可愛いか？","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of guy is he? Is he cute?"},{"lineNumber":254926,"originalJapaneseLine":"おっさんだよ、鬼、ごっつい。見た事ないけどいう聞いている","translatedEnglishLine":"An old man, a demon, tough-looking. I haven’t seen him, just heard about him."},{"lineNumber":254927,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・興味失うランス","translatedEnglishLine":"...Rance loses interest."},{"lineNumber":254928,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tメモ","translatedEnglishLine":"Note"},{"lineNumber":254929,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tレキシントンがケイブリス派に参加したのは最近で","translatedEnglishLine":"Lexington recently joined the Kaivelis faction."},{"lineNumber":254930,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラがランス共にコールドスリープしている時","translatedEnglishLine":"When Satella and Rance were in cold sleep,"},{"lineNumber":254931,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、魔軍司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, Demon Army Headquarters."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンを倒します。で、そのまま殺して魔血魂を回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We defeat Lexington. Then, kill him as is and collect the Magic Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しまった、うっかりやったしまった・・おっさんぽかったが女の子だったのに・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, I did it carelessly... He looked like an old man, but he was actually a girl...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念に思っていると、死体がどんどんおっさんに戻っていく・・うわ、おっさんがばけていたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As I was feeling disappointed, the corpse gradually transformed back into an old man... Wow, so the old man was disguised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺してよかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good thing I killed him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂が転がる、それをアトランタが拾おうとしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Magic Blood Soul rolls away, and Atlanta tries to pick it up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスが拾い上げる・・がはははは、やらんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rance picks it up... Hahaha, I'm not giving it to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっぱいもみながら、お前には何度か面倒な邪魔をされた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While fondling your breasts, you've caused me troublesome disturbances many times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの迷惑代を返してもらうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make you pay for all the trouble you've given me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の肉奴隷にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make you my sex slave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからもずっと素っ裸でいるがよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, you shall remain completely naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス側視点、いっきに押せ押せ状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lysus side perspective, rapidly pushing forward aggressively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝ちまくります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Winning repeatedly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍側視点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army side perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の魔人を一気に失った、魔人など偉そうだがこの程度
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We lost two demon lords at once; though they act proud, they're just this much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がリーザスを潰す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will crush Lysus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうひとりいたな邪魔だから更迭しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was another one, right? She's a nuisance, so I'll replace her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞勝利
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Victory

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルを力技で倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat Housel by brute force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方面の魔軍は総崩れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army in this sector is completely collapsing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの説得でハウゼルがおとなくなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Housel calmed down after Satella’s persuasion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ手は出せないが、手元にあるのでじっくりチャンスを見て犯そう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't make a move yet, but since he's at hand, I’ll patiently wait for the chance to violate him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が優秀過ぎるので予定より早くミッション完了したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I'm too excellent, the mission was completed earlier than planned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勢いで一気にもう一人の魔人シルキィを倒すか、それとも帰るか考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm thinking whether to use this momentum to quickly defeat the other demon lord Silky or to return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル、シルキィの両方を撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated both Housel and Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、お持ち帰りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, taking them home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５日後・・　どこか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Five days later... somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎とゆきちゃん、どうなっているよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What’s happening with Kaen and Yuki-chan?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人とも人間に負けて連れ去れた・・有り得ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both lost to humans and were taken away... Unbelievable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは怒っていたけど、助ける気なんかないみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshif was angry, but it seems he has no intention to rescue them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達がいかないといけないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はリーザス城でなくランス城に移送されたときき
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We heard the two were transferred to Rance Castle, not Lysus Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎とゆきちゃんは、ランス城に侵入した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaen and Yuki-chan infiltrated Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで見たのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What they saw there was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははと、もう二人と３Ｐプレイしまくりのランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance laughing 'Gahahahaha,' already having threesomes with the other two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・なんて事に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... What is this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスへ向かって出発するランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others depart heading toward Lysus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告．魔人レキシントンが動き出した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report: Demon lord Lexington has started moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部、ヨシフとハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army Headquarters, Yoshif and Housel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに不審がられて魔界に戻される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They became suspicious to Kaivelis and were sent back to the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブワンが引き取りにやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaive One comes to pick them up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部、ヨシフとシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army Headquarters, Yoshif and Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに不審がられて魔界に戻される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They became suspicious to Kaivelis and were sent back to the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブワンが引き取りにやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaive One comes to pick them up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、サテラにレキシントンの事を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, ask Satella about Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らないというか、居ないはずなんだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She doesn’t really know; he shouldn’t even exist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔いたよ、聖魔教団との戦争において唯一人間に倒されたのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was around long ago, the only one defeated by humans in the war against the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レキシントン、魔人の恥と言われていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon lord Lexington, called the disgrace of demon lords.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだと聞いていたのだけど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard he was dead, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして復活したのかしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be he has been resurrected?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな奴なのだ、可愛いか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of guy is he? Is he cute?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっさんだよ、鬼、ごっつい。見た事ないけどいう聞いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old man, a demon, tough-looking. I haven’t seen him, just heard about him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・興味失うランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance loses interest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンがケイブリス派に参加したのは最近で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington recently joined the Kaivelis faction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがランス共にコールドスリープしている時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Satella and Rance were in cold sleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Demon Army Headquarters.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンを倒します。で、そのまま殺して魔血魂を回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We defeat Lexington. Then, kill him as is and collect the Magic Blood Soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しまった、うっかりやったしまった・・おっさんぽかったが女の子だったのに・・と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, I did it carelessly... He looked like an old man, but he was actually a girl...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残念に思っていると、死体がどんどんおっさんに戻っていく・・うわ、おっさんがばけていたのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As I was feeling disappointed, the corpse gradually transformed back into an old man... Wow, so the old man was disguised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺してよかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Good thing I killed him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂が転がる、それをアトランタが拾おうとしたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Magic Blood Soul rolls away, and Atlanta tries to pick it up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスが拾い上げる・・がはははは、やらんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rance picks it up... Hahaha, I'm not giving it to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっぱいもみながら、お前には何度か面倒な邪魔をされた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While fondling your breasts, you've caused me troublesome disturbances many times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの迷惑代を返してもらうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make you pay for all the trouble you've given me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の肉奴隷にしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll make you my sex slave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからもずっと素っ裸でいるがよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, you shall remain completely naked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス側視点、いっきに押せ押せ状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lysus side perspective, rapidly pushing forward aggressively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝ちまくります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Winning repeatedly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍側視点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army side perspective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の魔人を一気に失った、魔人など偉そうだがこの程度
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We lost two demon lords at once; though they act proud, they're just this much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がリーザスを潰す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will crush Lysus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうひとりいたな邪魔だから更迭しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was another one, right? She's a nuisance, so I'll replace her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞勝利
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Victory

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルを力技で倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat Housel by brute force.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この方面の魔軍は総崩れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army in this sector is completely collapsing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの説得でハウゼルがおとなくなった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Housel calmed down after Satella’s persuasion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ手は出せないが、手元にあるのでじっくりチャンスを見て犯そう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't make a move yet, but since he's at hand, I’ll patiently wait for the chance to violate him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様が優秀過ぎるので予定より早くミッション完了したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I'm too excellent, the mission was completed earlier than planned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勢いで一気にもう一人の魔人シルキィを倒すか、それとも帰るか考えている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm thinking whether to use this momentum to quickly defeat the other demon lord Silky or to return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼル、シルキィの両方を撃破
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated both Housel and Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは、お持ち帰りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha, taking them home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５日後・・　どこか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Five days later... somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎とゆきちゃん、どうなっているよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What’s happening with Kaen and Yuki-chan?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人とも人間に負けて連れ去れた・・有り得ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both lost to humans and were taken away... Unbelievable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヨシフは怒っていたけど、助ける気なんかないみたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yoshif was angry, but it seems he has no intention to rescue them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達がいかないといけないわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人はリーザス城でなくランス城に移送されたときき
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We heard the two were transferred to Rance Castle, not Lysus Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎とゆきちゃんは、ランス城に侵入した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaen and Yuki-chan infiltrated Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで見たのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What they saw there was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははと、もう二人と３Ｐプレイしまくりのランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance laughing 'Gahahahaha,' already having threesomes with the other two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ・・なんて事に・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... What is this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜クリア＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Clear>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスへ向かって出発するランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others depart heading toward Lysus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 報告．魔人レキシントンが動き出した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report: Demon lord Lexington has started moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部、ヨシフとハウゼル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army Headquarters, Yoshif and Housel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに不審がられて魔界に戻される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They became suspicious to Kaivelis and were sent back to the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブワンが引き取りにやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaive One comes to pick them up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部、ヨシフとシルキィ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army Headquarters, Yoshif and Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスに不審がられて魔界に戻される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They became suspicious to Kaivelis and were sent back to the demon world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブワンが引き取りにやってくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaive One comes to pick them up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中、サテラにレキシントンの事を聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way, ask Satella about Lexington.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らないというか、居ないはずなんだけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She doesn’t really know; he shouldn’t even exist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔いたよ、聖魔教団との戦争において唯一人間に倒されたのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was around long ago, the only one defeated by humans in the war against the Holy Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レキシントン、魔人の恥と言われていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon lord Lexington, called the disgrace of demon lords.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだと聞いていたのだけど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard he was dead, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかして復活したのかしら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be he has been resurrected?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな奴なのだ、可愛いか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of guy is he? Is he cute?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっさんだよ、鬼、ごっつい。見た事ないけどいう聞いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An old man, a demon, tough-looking. I haven’t seen him, just heard about him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・興味失うランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Rance loses interest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メモ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Note

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レキシントンがケイブリス派に参加したのは最近で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lexington recently joined the Kaivelis faction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがランス共にコールドスリープしている時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Satella and Rance were in cold sleep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Demon Army Headquarters.
